# Create MCP App

Command-line tool to scaffold Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers with FastMCP.

## Usage

```bash
pip install create-mcp-app
create-mcp-app my-project
```

## Project Structure

```
my-project/
├── my_project/
│   ├── __init__.py
│   └── app.py
├── Dockerfile
├── requirements.txt
├── setup.py
├── README.md
└── .gitignore
```
